Text:
Grabbed this on RlsBB.com
and found its slightly out of sync (audio)
Still watchable but...

There is another version posted 350mb
I'm gonna grab that and see if its ok. This other vevrsion is not on TPB though.

Finished downloading the version of this episode floating around and this CRiMSON one is better in my opinion.
Although this one seems a bit out of sync when Jeremy is talking the overall video quality is way better on this on.. This one is about 1400kbs and the other one is about 900kbps with similar encoder settings.
So to summarize this video has a noticeably higher quality than the other one floating around so i wouldn't waste your time looking for the other one..
